name: fortinet-fortiflex
label: Fortinet FortiFlex
description: FortiFlex is a points-based program that empowers organizations to provision the Fortinet services and solutions, and offers the flexibility to scale their security solutions and services up or down as well as in or out to meet their dynamic deployment demands and evolving requirements.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server
fields.description: Specify the URL of the FortiFlex server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.tooltip: Specify the URL of the FortiFlex server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Username
fields.tooltip: Specify the username to access the FortiFlex server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: username
fields.description: Specify the username to access the FortiFlex server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Password
fields.tooltip: Specify the password to access the FortiFlex server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: password
fields.description: Specify the password to access the FortiFlex server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Client ID
fields.tooltip: Specify the ID of the client to access the FortiFlex server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: client_id
fields.description: Specify the ID of the client to access the FortiFlex server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Select whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.
fields.tooltip: Select whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.

operations.description: Retrieves the list of programs for an account from FortiFlex.
operations.title: Get All Program List

operations.description: Creates a new configuration under a specific program in FortiFlex based on the program serial number, configuration name, product type, and the account ID that you have specified.
operations.title: Create Configuration

parameters.title: Program Serial Number
parameters.description: Specify the serial number of the program based on which to create a new configuration in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: programSerialNumber
parameters.tooltip: Specify the serial number of the program based on which to create a new configuration in FortiFlex.

parameters.title: Configuration Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the configuration being created in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the configuration being created in FortiFlex.

parameters.title: Product Type
parameters.description: Select the product type for which you want to create a new configuration in FortiFlex. You can select from the following options: FortiGate Virtual Machine - Service Bundle, FortiGate Virtual Machine - A La Carte Services, etc.
options: FortiGate Virtual Machine - A La Carte Services

FortiGate Virtual Machine - Service Bund.title: Number of CPUs
FortiGate Virtual Machine - Service Bund.description: Select the number of CPUs for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. You can choose from the following options: 1 CPU, 2 CPU, 4 CPU, etc.
FortiGate Virtual Machine - Service Bund.name: FGTVMSBCpuSize
FortiGate Virtual Machine - Service Bund.tooltip: Select the number of CPUs for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. You can choose from the following options: 1 CPU, 2 CPU, 4 CPU, etc.

FortiGate Virtual Machine - Service Bund.title: Service Package
FortiGate Virtual Machine - Service Bund.description: Select the service package for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. You can choose from the following options: FortiCare, UTP, Enterprise, or ATP.
FortiGate Virtual Machine - Service Bund.name: FGTVMSBServicePackage
FortiGate Virtual Machine - Service Bund.tooltip: Select the service package for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. You can choose from the following options: FortiCare, UTP, Enterprise, or ATP.

FortiGate Virtual Machine - Service Bund.title: VDOMs
FortiGate Virtual Machine - Service Bund.description: Specify the number of VDOMs for the configuration being created in FortiFlex.
FortiGate Virtual Machine - Service Bund.name: FGTVMSBVDOMs
FortiGate Virtual Machine - Service Bund.tooltip: Specify the number of VDOMs for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. Minimum is 0, Maximum is 500.

FortiGate Virtual Machine - A La Carte S.title: Number of CPUs
FortiGate Virtual Machine - A La Carte S.description: Specify the number of CPUs for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. You can specify a minimum of 1 and maximum of 96 CPUs.
FortiGate Virtual Machine - A La Carte S.name: FGTVMALCSCpuSize
FortiGate Virtual Machine - A La Carte S.tooltip: Specify the number of CPUs for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. You can specify a minimum of 1 and maximum of 96 CPUs.

FortiGate Virtual Machine - A La Carte S.title: Support Services
FortiGate Virtual Machine - A La Carte S.description: Select the support services for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. You can choose from the following options: FortiCare Premium or FortiCare Elite.
FortiGate Virtual Machine - A La Carte S.name: FGTVMALCSSupportServices
FortiGate Virtual Machine - A La Carte S.tooltip: Select the support services for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. You can choose from the following options: FortiCare Premium or FortiCare Elite.

FortiGate Virtual Machine - A La Carte S.title: FortiGuard Services
FortiGate Virtual Machine - A La Carte S.description: Select the fortiGuard services for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. You can select one or more of the following options: Intrusion Prevention, Advanced Malware, Security Rating, etc.
FortiGate Virtual Machine - A La Carte S.name: FGTVMALCSFortiGuardServices
FortiGate Virtual Machine - A La Carte S.tooltip: Select the fortiGuard services for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. You can select one or more of the following options: Intrusion Prevention, Advanced Malware, Security Rating, etc.

FortiGate Virtual Machine - A La Carte S.title: Cloud Services
FortiGate Virtual Machine - A La Carte S.description: Select the cloud services for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. You can select one or more of the following options: FortiGate Cloud, SD-WAN Underlay, FortiAnalyzer Cloud with SOCaaS, or FortiAnalyzer Cloud.
FortiGate Virtual Machine - A La Carte S.name: FGTVMALCSCloudServices
FortiGate Virtual Machine - A La Carte S.tooltip: Select the cloud services for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. You can select one or more of the following options: FortiGate Cloud, SD-WAN Underlay, FortiAnalyzer Cloud with SOCaaS, or FortiAnalyzer Cloud.

FortiGate Virtual Machine - A La Carte S.title: VDOMs
FortiGate Virtual Machine - A La Carte S.description: Specify the number of VDOMs for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. You can specify a minimum of 0 and maximum of 500 VDOMs.
FortiGate Virtual Machine - A La Carte S.name: FGTVMALCSVDOMs
FortiGate Virtual Machine - A La Carte S.tooltip: Specify the number of VDOMs for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. You can specify a minimum of 0 and maximum of 500 VDOMs.

FortiWeb Virtual Machine - Service Bundl.title: Number of CPUs
FortiWeb Virtual Machine - Service Bundl.description: Select the number of CPUs for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. You can choose from the following options: 1 CPU, 2 CPU, 4 CPU, etc.
FortiWeb Virtual Machine - Service Bundl.name: FWBVMSBCpuSize
FortiWeb Virtual Machine - Service Bundl.tooltip: Select the number of CPUs for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. You can choose from the following options: 1 CPU, 2 CPU, 4 CPU, etc.

FortiWeb Virtual Machine - Service Bundl.title: Service Package
FortiWeb Virtual Machine - Service Bundl.description: Select the service package for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. You can choose from the following options: Standard or Advanced.
FortiWeb Virtual Machine - Service Bundl.name: FWBVMSBServicePackage
FortiWeb Virtual Machine - Service Bundl.tooltip: Select the service package for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. You can choose from the following options: Standard or Advanced.

FortiClient EMS On-Prem.title: Number of Endpoints for ZTNA/VPN
FortiClient EMS On-Prem.description: Specify the count of ZTNA/VPN endpoints for the configuration being created in FortiFlex.
FortiClient EMS On-Prem.name: FCLTZtna
FortiClient EMS On-Prem.tooltip: Specify the count of ZTNA/VPN endpoints for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. Minimum is 0, Maximum is 25000

FortiClient EMS On-Prem.title: Number of Endpoints for EPP/ATP + ZTNA/VPN
FortiClient EMS On-Prem.description: Specify the count of EPP/ATP + ZTNA/VPN endpoints for the configuration being created in FortiFlex.
FortiClient EMS On-Prem.name: FCLTEpp
FortiClient EMS On-Prem.tooltip: Specify the count of EPP/ATP + ZTNA/VPN endpoints for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. Minimum is 0, Maximum is 25000

FortiClient EMS On-Prem.title: Number of Endpoints for Chromebook
FortiClient EMS On-Prem.description: Specify the count of Chromebook endpoints for the configuration being created in FortiFlex.
FortiClient EMS On-Prem.name: FCLTChromebook
FortiClient EMS On-Prem.tooltip: Specify the count of Chromebook endpoints for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. Minimum is 0, Maximum is 25000

FortiClient EMS On-Prem.title: Support Services
FortiClient EMS On-Prem.description: Select the support services for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. Only FortiCare Premium is available for now.
FortiClient EMS On-Prem.name: FCLTSupportServices
FortiClient EMS On-Prem.tooltip: Select the support services for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. Only FortiCare Premium is available for now.

FortiClient EMS On-Prem.title: Addons
FortiClient EMS On-Prem.description: Select the addons for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. Only FortiCare Best Practice is available for now.
FortiClient EMS On-Prem.name: FCLTAddons
FortiClient EMS On-Prem.tooltip: Select the addons for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. Only FortiCare Best Practice is available for now.

FortiManager Virtual Machine.title: Number of Managed Devices
FortiManager Virtual Machine.description: Specify the count of managed devices for the configuration being created in FortiFlex.
FortiManager Virtual Machine.name: FMGVMManagedDevices
FortiManager Virtual Machine.tooltip: SSpecify the count of managed devices for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. Minimum is 1, Maximum is 100000.

FortiManager Virtual Machine.title: Number of ADOMs
FortiManager Virtual Machine.description: Specify the count of ADOMs for the configuration being created in FortiFlex.
FortiManager Virtual Machine.name: FMGVMAdoms
FortiManager Virtual Machine.tooltip: Specify the count of ADOMs for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. Minimum is 0, Maximum is 100000.

FortiAnalyzer Virtual Machine.title: Daily Storage (GB)
FortiAnalyzer Virtual Machine.description: Specify the daily storage, in GB, for the configuration being created in FortiFlex.
FortiAnalyzer Virtual Machine.name: FAZVMDailyStorage
FortiAnalyzer Virtual Machine.tooltip: Specify the daily storage, in GB, for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. Minimum is 5, Maximum is 8300.

FortiAnalyzer Virtual Machine.title: Number of ADOMs
FortiAnalyzer Virtual Machine.description: Specify the count of ADOMs for the configuration being created in FortiFlex.
FortiAnalyzer Virtual Machine.name: FAZVMAdoms
FortiAnalyzer Virtual Machine.tooltip: Specify the count of ADOMs for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. Minimum is 0, Maximum is 1200.

FortiAnalyzer Virtual Machine.title: Support Services
FortiAnalyzer Virtual Machine.description: Select the support services for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. Only FortiCare Premium is available for now.
FortiAnalyzer Virtual Machine.name: FAZSupportServices
FortiAnalyzer Virtual Machine.tooltip: Select the support services for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. Only FortiCare Premium is available for now.

FortiPortal Virtual Machine.title: Number of Managed Devices
FortiPortal Virtual Machine.description: Specify the count of managed devices for the configuration being created in FortiFlex.
FortiPortal Virtual Machine.name: FPTLManagedDevices
FortiPortal Virtual Machine.tooltip: Specify the count of managed devices for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. Minimum is 0, Maximum is 100000.

FortiADC Virtual Machine.title: Number of CPUs
FortiADC Virtual Machine.description: Select the number of CPUs for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. You can choose from the following options: 1 CPU, 2 CPU, 4CPU, etc.
FortiADC Virtual Machine.name: FADCVMCpuSize
FortiADC Virtual Machine.tooltip: Select the number of CPUs for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. You can choose from the following options: 1 CPU, 2 CPU, 4CPU, etc.

FortiADC Virtual Machine.title: Service Package
FortiADC Virtual Machine.description: Select the service package for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. You can choose from the following options: Standard, Advanced, or FortiCare Premium.
FortiADC Virtual Machine.name: FADCVMServicePackage
FortiADC Virtual Machine.tooltip: Select the service package for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. You can choose from the following options: Standard, Advanced, or FortiCare Premium.

FortiGate Hardware.title: Device Model
FortiGate Hardware.description: Select the device model for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. You can choose from the following options: FortiGate-40F, FortiGate-70F, FortiGate-80F, etc.
FortiGate Hardware.name: FGTHDeviceModel
FortiGate Hardware.tooltip: Select the device model for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. You can choose from the following options: FortiGate-40F, FortiGate-70F, FortiGate-80F, etc.

FortiGate Hardware.title: Service Package
FortiGate Hardware.description: Select the service package for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. You can choose from the following options: FortiCare Premium, FortiCare Elite, ATP, UTP, or Enterprise.
FortiGate Hardware.name: FCLTServicePackage
FortiGate Hardware.tooltip: Select the service package for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. You can choose from the following options: FortiCare Premium, FortiCare Elite, ATP, UTP, or Enterprise.

FortiGate Hardware.title: Addons
FortiGate Hardware.description: Select the addons for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. You can select one or more of the following options: FortiCare Elite Upgrade, FortiGate Cloud Management, AI-Based In-line Sandbox, etc. NOTE: FortiCare Elite Upgrade as an add-on is not applicable when the Service Package selected is FortiCare Premium or FortiCare Elite.
FortiGate Hardware.name: FCLTAddons
FortiGate Hardware.tooltip: Select the addons for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. You can select one or more of the following options: FortiCare Elite Upgrade, FortiGate Cloud Management, AI-Based In-line Sandbox, etc. NOTE: FortiCare Elite Upgrade as an add-on is not applicable when the Service Package selected is FortiCare Premium or FortiCare Elite.

FortiWeb Cloud - Private.title: Average Throughput
FortiWeb Cloud - Private.description: Select the average throughput for the configuration being created in FortiFlex.
FortiWeb Cloud - Private.name: FWBCPVTAvgThroughput
FortiWeb Cloud - Private.tooltip: Select the average throughput for the configuration being created in FortiFlex.

FortiWeb Cloud - Private.title: Web Applications
FortiWeb Cloud - Private.description: Specify the number of web applications for the configuration being created in FortiFlex.
FortiWeb Cloud - Private.name: FWBCPVTWebApp
FortiWeb Cloud - Private.tooltip: Specify the number of web applications for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. Minimum is 1, Maximum is 2000.

FortiWeb Cloud - Public.title: Average Throughput
FortiWeb Cloud - Public.description: Select the average throughput for the configuration being created in FortiFlex.
FortiWeb Cloud - Public.name: FWBCPUBAvgThroughput
FortiWeb Cloud - Public.tooltip: Select the average throughput for the configuration being created in FortiFlex.

FortiWeb Cloud - Public.title: Web Applications
FortiWeb Cloud - Public.description: Specify the number of web applications for the configuration being created in FortiFlex.
FortiWeb Cloud - Public.name: FWBCPUBWebApp
FortiWeb Cloud - Public.tooltip: Specify the number of web applications for the configuration being created in FortiFlex. Minimum is 1, Maximum is 2000.

parameters.name: productTypeId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the type ID of the program based on which you want to create a new configuration in FortiFlex.

parameters.title: Account ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the account based on which you want to create a new configuration in FortiFlex..
parameters.name: accountId
parameters.tooltip: If "Account ID" not provided, create new configuration in the same account that API user belongs to otherwise it will create new configurations in that account.

operations.description: Retrieves the list of configurations for a program from FortiFlex based on the program serial number and the account ID you have specified.
operations.title: Get All Configuration List

parameters.title: Program Serial Number
parameters.description: Specify the serial number of the program based on which you want to retrieve configurations from FortiFlex.
parameters.name: programSerialNumber
parameters.tooltip: Specify the serial number of the program based on which you want to retrieve configurations from FortiFlex.

parameters.title: Account ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the account based on which you want to retrieve configurations from FortiFlex.
parameters.name: accountId
parameters.tooltip: If "Account ID" not provided, return all configurations of all tenant accounts under the organization otherwise it only return configurations of that account.

operations.description: Enables a specific configuration of a program in FortiFlex based on the configuration ID you have specified. NOTE: Enabling a configuration affects all virtual machines which were created based on that configuration.
operations.title: Enable Configuration

parameters.title: Configuration ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the configuration to enable in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the configuration to enable in FortiFlex.

operations.description: Disables a specific configuration of a program in FortiFlex based on the configuration ID you have specified.NOTE: Disabling a configuration affects all virtual machines which were created based on that configuration.
operations.title: Disable Configuration

parameters.title: Configuration ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the configuration to disable in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the configuration to disable in FortiFlex.

operations.description: Updates an existing configuration in FortiFlex based on the configuration ID, configuration name, and the product type that you have specified. NOTE: Updating a configuration's parameters, such as the number of CPUs, affects all virtual machines which were created based on that configuration.
operations.title: Update Configuration

parameters.title: Configuration ID
parameters.description: SSpecify the ID of the configuration being updated in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the configuration being updated in FortiFlex.

parameters.description: Specify the name of the configuration being updated in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the configuration being updated in FortiFlex.

FortiGate Hardware.tooltip: Select the addons for the configuration being updated in FortiFlex. You can select one or more of the following options: FortiCare Elite Upgrade, FortiGate Cloud Management, AI-Based In-line Sandbox, etc. NOTE: FortiCare Elite Upgrade as an add-on is not applicable when the Service Package selected is FortiCare Premium or FortiCare Elite.

FortiWeb Cloud - Private.name: FWBCPVTAvgThroughput

FortiWeb Cloud - Private.title: Web Applications

FortiWeb Cloud - Private.name: FWBCPVTWebApp
FortiWeb Cloud - Private.tooltip: Specify the number of web applications for the configuration being updated in FortiFlex. Minimum is 1, Maximum is 2000.

parameters.name: productTypeId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the type ID of the program based on which you want to update a new configuration in FortiFlex.

operations.description: Creates a VM entitlement in FortiFlex based on the configuration ID, count, folder path, description, and end datetime that you have specified.
operations.title: Create VM Entitlements

parameters.title: Configuration ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the configuration based on which you want to create VM entitlements in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: configId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the configuration based on which you want to create VM entitlements in FortiFlex.

parameters.title: Count
parameters.description: Specify the count of VM entitlements to create in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: count
parameters.tooltip: Specify the count of VM entitlements to create in FortiFlex.

parameters.title: Folder Path
parameters.description: Specify the folder path of VM entitlements to create in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: folderPath
parameters.tooltip: Specify the folder path of VM entitlements to create in FortiFlex.

parameters.title: Description
parameters.description: Specify a brief description of VM entitlements to create in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: description
parameters.tooltip: Specify a brief description of VM entitlements to create in FortiFlex.

parameters.title: End DateTime
parameters.description: Specify the end date time of VM entitlements being created in FortiFlex. NOTE: By passing null or leaving the field blank, the entitlement uses the Program's end date automatically.
parameters.name: endDate
parameters.tooltip: Specify the end date time of VM entitlements being created in FortiFlex. NOTE: By passing null or leaving the field blank, the entitlement uses the Program's end date automatically.

operations.description: Creates a hardware entitlement in FortiFlex based on the configuration ID, serial numbers, and end datetime that you have specified.
operations.title: Create Hardware Entitlements

parameters.title: Configuration ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the configuration based on which you want to create a hardware entitlements in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: configId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the configuration based on which you want to create a hardware entitlements in FortiFlex.

parameters.title: Serial Numbers
parameters.description: Specify the serial numbers of the hardware entitlements to create in FortiFlex. You can specify multiple serial numbers as comma-separated values.
parameters.name: serialNumbers
parameters.tooltip: Specify the serial numbers of the hardware entitlements to create in FortiFlex. You can specify multiple serial numbers as comma-separated values.

parameters.title: End DateTime
parameters.description: Specify the end datetime of the hardware entitlements to create in FortiFlex. NOTE: By passing null or leaving the field blank, the entitlement uses the Program's end date automatically.
parameters.name: endDate
parameters.tooltip: Specify the end datetime of the hardware entitlements to create in FortiFlex. NOTE: By passing null or leaving the field blank, the entitlement uses the Program's end date automatically.

operations.description: Retrieves the list of existing entitlements for a configuration from FortiFlex based on the configuration ID or account ID you have specified.
operations.title: Get All Entitlement List

parameters.title: Fetch Based On
parameters.description: Select an option to filter entitlements retrieved by this operation. You can choose from following options: Configuration ID or Account ID and Program Serial Number.
parameters.name: filter
parameters.tooltip: Select an option to filter entitlements retrieved by this operation. You can choose from following options: Configuration ID or Account ID and Program Serial Number.
options: Account ID and Program Serial Number

Configuration ID.title: Configuration ID
Configuration ID.description: Specify the configuration ID, in the configuration ID field, to retrieve entitlements from FortiFlex.
Configuration ID.name: configId
Configuration ID.tooltip: Specify the configuration ID, in the configuration ID field, to retrieve entitlements from FortiFlex.

Account ID and Program Serial Number.title: Account ID
Account ID and Program Serial Number.description: Specify the account ID to retrieve entitlements from FortiFlex.
Account ID and Program Serial Number.name: accountId
Account ID and Program Serial Number.tooltip: Specify the account ID to retrieve entitlements from FortiFlex.

Account ID and Program Serial Number.title: Program Serial Number
Account ID and Program Serial Number.description: Specify the program serial number to retrieve entitlements from FortiFlex.
Account ID and Program Serial Number.name: programSerialNumber
Account ID and Program Serial Number.tooltip: Specify the program serial number to retrieve entitlements from FortiFlex.

operations.description: Update an entitlements details in FortiFlex based on the configuration ID, serial number, description, and end datetime that you have specified.
operations.title: Update Entitlements

parameters.title: Configuration ID
parameters.description: Specify the configuration ID of the entitlements to update in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: configId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the configuration ID of the entitlements to update in FortiFlex.

parameters.title: Serial Number
parameters.description: Specify the serial number of the entitlements to update in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: serialNumber
parameters.tooltip: Specify the serial number of the entitlements to update in FortiFlex.

parameters.title: Description
parameters.description: Specify the brief description of the entitlements to update in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: description
parameters.tooltip: Specify the brief description of the entitlements to update in FortiFlex.

parameters.title: End DateTime
parameters.description: Specify the end datetime of the entitlements to update in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: endDate
parameters.tooltip: Specify the end datetime of the entitlements to update in FortiFlex.

operations.description: Stop an entitlement in FortiFlex based on the serial number you have specified.
operations.title: Stop Entitlement

parameters.title: Serial Number
parameters.description: Specify the serial number of the entitlement to stop in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: serialNumber
parameters.tooltip: Specify the serial number of the entitlement to stop in FortiFlex.

operations.description: Reactivate an entitlement after being stopped in FortiFlex based on the serial number you have specified.
operations.title: Reactivate Entitlement

parameters.title: Serial Number
parameters.description: Specify the serial number of the entitlement to reactivate in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: serialNumber
parameters.tooltip: Specify the serial number of the entitlement to reactivate in FortiFlex.

operations.description: Move serial numbers and entitlements managed by FortiFlex from one account to another based on the source account ID, target account ID, and other input parameters you have specified.
operations.title: Transfer Entitlement

parameters.title: Source Account ID
parameters.description: Specify the source account ID from where the entitlements are being transferred in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: sourceAccountId
parameters.tooltip: "Source Account ID" and "Target Account ID" should belong to the same organization and API user should have access to both (permission scope).

parameters.title: Source Config ID
parameters.description: Specify the source config ID associated with the entitlements being transferred in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: sourceConfigId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the source config ID. Note: "Source Config ID" should belong to "Source Account ID".

parameters.title: Serial Number
parameters.description: Specify the comma-separated serial numbers of the entitlements being transferred in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: serialNumbers
parameters.tooltip: Specify the comma-separated serial numbers of the entitlements being transferred in FortiFlex. Note: All serial numbers should belong to "Source Config ID"

parameters.title: Target Account ID
parameters.description: Specify the target account ID to where the entitlements are being transferred in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: targetAccountId
parameters.tooltip: "Source Account ID" and "Target Account ID" should belong to the same organization and API user should have access to both (permission scope).

parameters.title: Target Config ID
parameters.description: Specify the target config ID associated with the entitlements being transferred in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: targetConfigId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the target config ID. Note: If "Target Config ID" is not provided, create a copy of source configuration in target account regardless of whether similar configuration already exists otherwise it belongs to "Target Account ID". Also, source configuration and target configuration should be the same product type. But they don't have to have same parameter values.

operations.description: Regenerate token for a VM in FortiFlex based on the serial number you have specified.
operations.title: Regenerate Token for VM

parameters.title: Serial Number
parameters.description: Specify the serial number of the VM to regenerate its token in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: serialNumber
parameters.tooltip: Specify the serial number of the VM to regenerate its token in FortiFlex.

operations.description: Retrieves the total points consumed by one or more virtual machines in a date range in FortiFlex based on the datetime range and other parameters you have specified.
operations.title: Get Point Usage for VM

parameters.title: Fetch Based On
parameters.description: Select an option to filter points usage retrieved by this operation. You can choose from following options: Configuration ID or Account ID and Program Serial Number.
parameters.name: filter
parameters.tooltip: Select an option to filter points usage retrieved by this operation. You can choose from following options: Configuration ID or Account ID and Program Serial Number.
options: Account ID and Program Serial Number

Configuration ID.title: Configuration ID
Configuration ID.description: Specify the configuration ID, in the configuration ID field, to retrieve points usage from FortiFlex.
Configuration ID.name: configId
Configuration ID.tooltip: Specify the configuration ID, in the configuration ID field, to retrieve points usage from FortiFlex.

Account ID and Program Serial Number.title: Account ID
Account ID and Program Serial Number.description: Specify the account ID to retrieve points usage from FortiFlex.
Account ID and Program Serial Number.name: accountId
Account ID and Program Serial Number.tooltip: Specify the account ID to retrieve points usage from FortiFlex.

Account ID and Program Serial Number.title: Program Serial Number
Account ID and Program Serial Number.description: Specify the program serial number to retrieve points usage from FortiFlex.
Account ID and Program Serial Number.name: programSerialNumber
Account ID and Program Serial Number.tooltip: Specify the program serial number to retrieve points usage from FortiFlex.

parameters.title: Start DateTime
parameters.description: Specify the start date and time of the points usage to retrieve points for a VM in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: startDate
parameters.tooltip: Specify the start date and time of the points usage to retrieve points for a VM in FortiFlex.

parameters.title: End DateTime
parameters.description: Specify the end date and time of the points usage to retrieve points for a VM in FortiFlex.
parameters.name: endDate
parameters.tooltip: Specify the end date and time of the points usage to retrieve points for a VM in FortiFlex.

operations.description: Retrieves the list of groups from FortiFlex based on the account ID you have specified.
operations.title: Get All Group List

parameters.title: Account ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the account to retrieve its groups from FortiFlex.
parameters.name: accountId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the account to retrieve its groups from FortiFlex.

operations.description: Retrieves first available token from FortiFlex based on the account ID and other input parameters you have specified.
operations.title: Get NextToken for Group

parameters.title: Account ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the account to retrieve its NextToken from FortiFlex.
parameters.name: accountId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the account to retrieve its NextToken from FortiFlex.

parameters.title: Config ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the config associated with the account to retrieve its NextToken from FortiFlex.
parameters.name: configId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the config associated with the account to retrieve its NextToken from FortiFlex.

parameters.title: Asset Folder Path
parameters.description: Specify the folder path of the asset to retrieve its NextToken from FortiFlex.
